column4: Does anyone know of a driver or anything written for an envision lcd monitor?
you dont really need drivers for a monitor, but I'm guessing you want to use the max resolutions?
Well what happens is I try to configure them, and it seems to confuse which is my main monitor and which is the secondary and cuts them in half etc. I can't get it to work right at any resolution...
hmm, not too sure about multimonitor setups
